players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Diana: "I trust Bob's investigation. Let's vote Charlie out to protect the town."
You: "Charlie, your silence speaks volumes. We have the evidence. Diana, let's vote together and end this."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did the mafia kill Alice instead of you? This doesn't add up."
Charlie: "I think we're jumping to conclusions about the detective. We should focus on gathering more evidence instead of making assumptions."
